tests.name: Has dedicated Testing & Validation Requirements section
tests.details: Dedicated section with emoji and MANDATORY designation

tests.name: References AGENTS.md foundational rule
tests.details: Must reference the foundational rule from AGENTS.md

tests.name: Includes AGENTS.md reference in testing section
tests.details: Must reference AGENTS.md for testing standards

tests.name: Specifies TDD methodology (RED-GREEN-REFACTOR)
tests.details: Must include all three TDD phases

tests.name: TDD methodology properly explained
tests.details: TDD phases must be properly explained

tests.name: Includes testing frameworks table
tests.details: Must document required testing frameworks

tests.name: Specifies Jest for backend testing
tests.details: Must include Jest as testing framework option

tests.name: Specifies Playwright/Cypress for frontend testing
tests.details: Must include frontend testing frameworks

tests.name: Has "No Task Without Tests" policy section
tests.details: Must have dedicated policy section

tests.name: Policy is marked as MANDATORY
tests.details: Policy must be marked as mandatory

tests.name: Policy includes rejection clause
tests.details: Must specify rejection of tasks without tests

tests.name: Has pre-spawn validation checklist
tests.details: Must have mandatory pre-spawn validation

tests.name: Pre-spawn checklist includes User Story requirement
tests.details: Must verify User Story exists before spawning

tests.name: Pre-spawn checklist includes test strategy requirement
tests.details: Must verify test strategy exists

tests.name: Pre-spawn checklist includes testing framework specification
tests.details: Must verify testing framework is specified

tests.name: Pre-spawn checklist includes validation method requirement
tests.details: Must verify validation method is documented

tests.name: Pre-spawn checklist includes evidence collection requirement
tests.details: Must verify evidence collection is planned

tests.name: Has enhanced worker spawn template section
tests.details: Must document enhanced spawning process

tests.name: Worker spawn template includes TDD approach
tests.details: Worker spawn must include TDD methodology

tests.name: Worker spawn template includes testing requirements section
tests.details: Worker spawn must include testing requirements

tests.name: Worker spawn template references AGENTS.md
tests.details: Worker spawn must reference AGENTS.md testing section

tests.name: 3-Layer validation workflow documented
tests.details: Must document 3-layer validation process

tests.name: Layer 1 (Self-Validation) defined
tests.details: Must define worker self-validation layer

tests.name: Layer 2 (Manager Validation) defined
tests.details: Must define manager validation layer

tests.name: Layer 3 (Independent Validation) defined
tests.details: Must define independent validation layer

tests.name: Specifies test evidence requirements
tests.details: Must specify evidence requirements

tests.name: Cannot claim complete without test evidence
tests.details: Must specify completion depends on test evidence

tests.name: Cannot approve without reviewing test results
tests.details: Must specify approval depends on test review

tests.name: Includes enhanced verification template
tests.details: Must provide verification template for managers

tests.name: Verification template includes test evidence review
tests.details: Verification must check test evidence

tests.name: Includes multi-perspective self-validation guidance
tests.details: Must provide guidance for spawning verification sub-agents

tests.name: Self-validation includes different perspectives
tests.details: Must include multiple validation perspectives

tests.name: Documents when to spawn verification sub-agent
tests.details: Must guide when additional verification is needed

tests.name: Includes specific testing framework requirements in task assignment
tests.details: Task assignment must specify testing frameworks

tests.name: References User Stories requirement from AGENTS.md
tests.details: Must enforce user story requirements

tests.name: Task assignment format includes testing requirements
tests.details: Task assignments must include mandatory testing section
